caption:
This photograph presents a nighttime scene focusing on a dark, muddy path illuminated by a glimmering light that appears to be the sun or a strong light source seen through trees. The path is richly textured, possibly wet as indicated by the reflective surface that sparkles under the light, giving an impression of a recent rainfall or dew. The textures of the path are enhanced by the light, creating scattered, glistening spots that capture the viewer's attention.

The composition of the image is centered on the pathway which leads directly to the light source, and thus draws the eye towards the light. The surroundings are quite dark, with the edges of trees barely visible against the night sky, creating a natural frame around the pathway. The glow from the light source sparsely illuminates these trees, outlining them slightly and enhancing the feeling of depth and mystery in the thick woodland surrounding the path.

This setting evokes a sense of solitude and quiet, suggesting a late or very early time of day when few would be out. The overall atmosphere is somewhat eerie yet mesmerizing, with the combination of darkness, the central bright light, and the reflective path creating a compelling study of light and texture.
title: View of the green mountain forestry road, a little maintained, much-used recreational road in southern Kitsap County.  Increased land use pressure for roads like this is expected when the navy's trident submarine base is built nearby.  A "new city" is proposed to house a substantial portion of the projected 27,000 people who will move into the area when the naval installation is completed
